SENSEPOOL.SPID: Disappearance - state of being in an unknown location
SENSEPOOL.NAME: P2252
SENSEPOOL.COMMENTARY: the state of being in an unknown location. 'disappearance' has an intransitive sense, the subject disappears; in contrast, 'loss' is a transitive senses, an agent loses something 'the loss of my watch' implies 'I lost a watch', whereas 'Jane's disappearance' implies 'Jane disappeared'
